lyrics:
17 contributorsbreakdown lyricsverse
its alright if you love me
its alright if you dont
im not afraid of you runnin away honey
i get the feeling you wont
say there aint no sense in pretending
your eyes give you away
something inside you is feeling like i do
we said all there is to say

baby

breakdown now im standin here cant you see
breakdown its alright
its alright its alright
